title: Part One: Oregon is a Bastard: The History of a White Supremacist State
itunes:title: Part One: Oregon is a Bastard: The History of a White Supremacist State
description:
In episode 35, Portland activist Marielle Eaton sits down with Robert Evans to talk about Oregon's exceedingly Bastardful history as a white nationalist paradise.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
